personal.name: Niño Marcos
personal.title: Full Stack Developer
personal.summary: IT student passionate about building modern web applications with clean, elegant solutions. Experienced in full-stack development with Next.js, React, and TypeScript. Competition background in robotics programming using Python.
personal.elevator_pitch: Full-stack developer with a strong foundation in modern web technologies and a proven track record in international robotics competitions. I build scalable, user-friendly applications using Next.js, TypeScript, and cutting-edge tools like AI integration and RAG systems.

salary_location.current_status: Student seeking internship or entry-level opportunities

salary_location.remote_experience: Experienced with remote collaboration and self-directed learning

experience.title: Full Stack Developer
experience.team_structure: Independent developer with collaboration on open-source projects

achievements_star.situation: Need to demonstrate modern web development skills to potential employers and learn OAuth implementation
achievements_star.task: Build a production-ready Next.js application with secure authentication and database integration
achievements_star.action: Developed Person Search app using Next.js 15, implemented Google OAuth, integrated Prisma ORM with PostgreSQL, created protected routes, and deployed to Vercel with comprehensive documentation
achievements_star.result: Successfully deployed secure application demonstrating full-stack capabilities. Gained practical experience with OAuth flows, database management, and modern deployment practices

achievements_star.situation: Required a professional online presence to showcase skills and projects to recruiters
achievements_star.task: Create a modern, responsive portfolio website that stands out from typical templates
achievements_star.action: Built custom portfolio with Next.js 15, implemented dark/light mode theming using next-themes, added smooth animations with Framer Motion, optimized performance, and deployed to Vercel
achievements_star.result: Created distinctive portfolio showcasing technical skills and design sensibility. Received positive feedback on clean, minimalist design approach

achievements_star.situation: Growing interest in AI/ML technologies and need to demonstrate RAG system implementation
achievements_star.task: Implement a production-ready RAG system for portfolio AI assistant
achievements_star.action: Integrated Groq AI with llama-3.1-8b-instant model, set up Upstash Vector database for semantic search, structured professional profile using STAR methodology, implemented streaming responses with Vercel AI SDK
achievements_star.result: Built functional AI assistant capable of answering recruiter queries about skills and experience in real-time, demonstrating modern AI integration capabilities

experience.title: Team Philippines Representative

achievements_star.task: Compete in Programming Skills Excellence category against 118 international teams
achievements_star.action: Developed and optimized Python programming solutions for VEX IQ robotics challenges, collaborated with team members, debugged code under time pressure
achievements_star.result: Achieved 4th place finish in Programming Skills Excellence category, demonstrating strong problem-solving and coding skills on international stage

projects_portfolio.name: AI-Powered Portfolio with RAG System
projects_portfolio.description: Modern portfolio website featuring an AI assistant powered by RAG (Retrieval-Augmented Generation) for answering professional queries. Built with Next.js 15, Groq AI, and Upstash Vector database.
projects_portfolio.impact: Demonstrates advanced AI integration capabilities and modern full-stack development skills

projects_portfolio.name: Person Search - OAuth Secured App
projects_portfolio.description: Full-stack Next.js application with Google OAuth authentication, Prisma ORM, and PostgreSQL database. Features protected routes and comprehensive CRUD operations.
projects_portfolio.impact: Production-ready application demonstrating secure authentication and database management

projects_portfolio.name: Modern Portfolio Website
projects_portfolio.description: Responsive portfolio showcasing work, skills, and experience. Features dark/light mode, smooth animations, and optimized performance.
projects_portfolio.impact: Professional web presence with distinctive minimalist design

career_goals.long_term: Become a senior full-stack developer specializing in AI-powered applications

behavioral: Tell me about your robotics competition experience and what you learned
Describe a challenging project you built and how you overcame obstacles
How do you stay current with new technologies and frameworks?
What motivates you as a developer?
technical: Explain your approach to building a full-stack application from scratch
How would you implement authentication in a Next.js application?
Walk me through how RAG systems work and your implementation
What's your experience with databases and ORMs like Prisma?
situational: If you encountered a bug in production, what would be your approach?
How would you approach learning a completely new technology for a project?
Describe how you would optimize a slow-loading web application

preparation_questions: What excites you about our company?
Where do you see yourself in 5 years?

weakness_mitigation.mitigation: Compensated with strong self-directed learning, multiple deployed projects, and proven competition success. Quick learner demonstrated through rapid technology adoption in projects.
Actively studying through building projects, implementing AI systems, and following best practices. Strong foundation in modern frameworks provides good basis for growth.
